# ENTITY::GET_ENTITY_VELOCITY

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity

## Returns
* **VECTOR**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Gets the current velocity of the entity. If the entity is a ped in a vehicle, then the
velocity of the vehicle is returned;
